name: Javert Simulator
description:
Play alongside Javert as he discovers the culprit of a theft and break-in - but how far do you agree with him?

Javert Simulator - a short demo showcasing an adaptation of Javert's character from Victor Hugo's novel Les Misérables, created as part of my Honours project.

Use the arrow keys to move and interact with people and objects. The demo should take roughly 5 minutes to complete. 

As mentioned, this is a very short demo which I hope to expand into a longer game in the future. Comments and feedback are encouraged!

Credits

  • Created using Bitsy, alongside the Image-to-Bitsy and  BitsyMuse audio mods.
  • ‘Big waves hit land’ (2017) recorded by Straget. Available at: https://freesound.org/people/straget/sounds/412308/
  • ‘How a French city sounds V2’ (2017) recorded by FreeToUseSounds. Available at: https://freesound.org/people/FreeToUseSounds/sounds/394331/
